New Records: Andre Russell took his 50th T20 international wicket
Key Match Events: Roston Chase and Andre Russell calmed West Indies' fears as they successfully chased down a target of 137
Sese Bau led the recovery for Papua New Guinea to muster 136/8
Roston Chase produced a composed knock to guide West Indies to a win in the run-chase
Andre Russell had taken the 50th wicket of his T20 international career when Charles Amini nicked behind on 12
Alei Nao had struck in the second over, removing Johnson Charles lbw for a duck
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights available in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase said 'I'm very pleased. Starting the tournament with a win is always good. I needed to take it home for the team, and I did it'
Papua New Guinea captain Assad Vala said 'We were very happy with the way we fought - we got wickets at key moments'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Co-hosts West Indies were pushed all the way by Papua New Guinea as they began their ICC Men's T20 World Cup campaign in Guyana
West Indies beat PNG by five wickets in a thrilling game in Guyana in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
Others: No other details available in the article
